    Method
    Description
    static ImageMatrix
    Blurring.blurringFilter(ImageMatrix toFilter, int percentage)
    This static method applies a blurring filter to an image, using a convolution operation.

    Adjusts the brightness of the given ImageMatrix based on the provided percentage.

    Adjusts the contrast of the given ImageMatrix based on the provided percentage.
    static ImageMatrix

    Detects the edges in the given ImageMatrix based on the provided percentage.
    static ImageMatrix
    GrayScale.grayScalingFilter(ImageMatrix imageMatrix, int percentage)
    This method creates a grayscale version of the given image.
    static ImageMatrix
    EdgeDetection.Preprocessing(ImageMatrix imageMatrix)
    Applies grayscale and blur filters to the given ImageMatrix.
    static ImageMatrix
    Sharpening.sharpeningFilter(ImageMatrix imageMatrix, int percentage)
    The sharpeningFilter method applies a sharpening effect to an ImageMatrix.
